title: Mobile-Based Music Composition Inquiry Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic music theory comprehension and fundamental smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Short-term workshop format for pre-service teachers, utilizing only mobile devices and music apps for the learning environment

learning_goals: Learners complete creative works applying three or more musical structures (introduction-development-conclusion) using a smartphone app.
Learners improve their composition process at least three times through peer feedback and reflective thinking.
Learners identify and apply five or more musical elements (rhythm/harmony/timbre) using technological tools.

resources: Free Composition Apps (e.g., FL Studio Mobile, GarageBand)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
